Reviews.Title: Great camera and timely delivery but.....
Reviews.Author: babyggurl
Reviews.Content: I received this camera with on-time delivery and am very pleased with my purchase.  The only problem I had was that the manual CD was cracked.  I spoke with the seller and they assured me that they would send me a replacement disc free of charge and that the damage must have happened while in route.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!
Reviews.Author: Shmink
Reviews.Content: This camera is so easy to use but effective. My friends and family are always raving over how wonderful the pictures turn out!

Reviews.Title: Insignia Digital Camera Review
Reviews.Author: MamaFish
Reviews.Content: The camera takes decent pictures for a basic point-and-shoot; however, the battery life is next to nothing.  I think I might get 1~2 hours of battery life from this camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
7.0 megapixels
Shooting Programs: Landscape, Portrait mod, Back light, Night mode, Sunset, Food, Fireworks, Text, Snow, Children
Exposure Modes: Aperture-priority, Program, Automatic, Shutter-priority
Video Capture: AVI - 320 x 240 , AVI - 640 x 480
Supported Flash Memory: MultiMediaCard, SD Memory Card
ProductInfo.Name: insignia NS-DSC7P09 7MP Digital Camera (Pink)
